document_data.mainbody: '''''The Legend of Drizzt: The Legacy''''' (original title: '''''Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 7: The Legacy''''') is the graphic novel version of [[R.A. Salvatore]]'s novel ''[[The Legacy]]''. It was originally published in three parts: The Legend of Drizzt: The Legacy #1â€“3.
